interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula
Review Date: 2020/06/08
Store: Pure Daily Care
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'}
Review Text: This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it!
Review Title: Keeps germs away!!!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Brush Strokes Large Ball Tip Rounder Brush (Assorted Colors) Brush Strokes {'Brand': 'Brush Strokes', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.6 x 2.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B004F0KBDW_US', 'UPC': '794168349933'} Pros: This brush is so light weight and makes it so easy to create a smooth, straight look with your hair. It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Great for smoothing and straightening hair! Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Cancun Collection {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap! I recommend this product! See my pictures for more information. Great, natural looking bronzer! MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson {'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.25 x 4.5 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005719'} This MD Complete Bright & Healthy serum has all the ingredients recommended to treat fine lines, wrinkles and dull texture (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Retinol and Omega-3). However, I did not find this to be moisturizing at all and it actually dried my skin out - making my fine lines and wrinkles more noticeable. The product indicates this product is great for someone in their 20’s or 30’s - maybe that’s true, but this is not an effective product for someone 40+ dealing with aging skin. I cannot recommend this product for aging skin - maybe it’s effective for younger skin to prevent aging 🤷🏼‍♀️ - but it is not restorative if you have aging skin. Not recommended for aging skin 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Pure Daily Care {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it! Keeps germs away!!!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** 
  - Favors light-weight hair tools for ease of use.
  - Prioritizes functionality, especially in smoothing and straightening capabilities.
  - Chooses brushes designed to minimize tangling.
  - Interested in skincare products that yield effective results without harmful chemicals, particularly alternatives to sun exposure.
  - Recently demonstrated a preference for practical personal care items, such as hand sanitizers with moisturizing properties.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** 
  - Selects products formulated for fine hair, mindful of their effects on body and volume.

- **Experience with Products:**
  - Generally satisfied with products, reflected in a positive average rating.
  - Recognizes the necessity of balancing functionality with individual hair needs and appreciates skincare items that offer natural finishes and simple application.
  - Recent experiences indicate a strong focus on not just anti-aging efficacy but also on overall skin health and hydration.

- **Overall Trends:**
  - Values efficiency and usability in styling tools, seeking quick and effective solutions.
  - Is inclined toward products that enhance natural beauty with minimal effort, confirmed by positive experiences with versatile beauty items.
  - Exhibits a growing concern for the effectiveness of personal care products, highlighting the importance of balance between potent formulas and skin hydration, especially in addressing needs associated with aging skin.
